headings.usage: All page titles, section headers, and metric values.

body.usage: Table data, labels, form inputs, and descriptions.

mono.usage: SKUs, ID numbers, and technical data.

primary.description: Deep Indigo - Use for primary actions, active states, and brand presence.

accent.description: Signal Orange - Use for low stock alerts, warnings, and critical notifications.

textures.cardboard: Use the cardboard texture image as a subtle overlay (opacity 0.05) on the sidebar or empty states.

layout.alignment: Left-aligned text for readability. Right-aligned numbers/currency.

buttons.style: Sharp edges (rounded-none), bold text, high contrast.

variants.secondary: bg-white border-2 border-black text-black hover:bg-gray-100 shadow-[2px_2px_0px_0px_#000000]

cards.style: Flat, white background, 1px border-gray-200. No massive shadows. Use 'border-l-4' for status indication.

inputs.style: bg-gray-50 border-gray-300 focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary rounded-none h-12

tables.style: Dense, minimal borders. Header: uppercase, text-xs, tracking-wider, text-gray-500. Row hover: bg-gray-50.

textures.description: Cardboard texture for subtle backgrounds or empty states.

abstract.description: Geometric warehouse abstract for login or hero areas.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement a 'Swiss Industrial' aesthetic: strict grids, high contrast, and functional typography.
Use 'Manrope' for all headings to give a technical feel.
Use 'Inter' for body text and data tables.
Primary Action Color is Deep Indigo (#1E1B4B). Alert Color is Signal Orange (#F97316).
Dashboard Layout: Use a dense Bento grid. Top row for KPIs (Total Boxes, Low Stock). Middle for Usage Chart. Bottom for Recent Activity.
Inventory List: Create a dense, filterable table. Use color-coded badges for stock levels (Green = Good, Orange = Low, Red = Critical).
Forms: Use large, clear inputs. This is a utility tool; ease of data entry is paramount.
Charts: Use Recharts with the defined color palette. Keep them simple (Bar or Line). No 3D charts.
Do NOT use rounded corners. Set 'rounded-none' or 'rounded-sm' (2px) max. We want a sharp, boxy look.
Add a 'Dark Mode' toggle, but optimize primarily for a clean, bright Light Mode.
Use the cardboard texture image subtly (e.g., as a sidebar background pattern with low opacity) to hint at the 'Box' theme without being cheesy.
universal_guidelines: Avoid generic 'AI slop' designs. Be bold with spacing and contrast.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical. 'p-8' is the new 'p-4'.
Micro-animations are mandatory. Hover states must be clear.
Do not use 'transition: all'. Animate specific properties.
Never center-align the main app container.
